thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Serene!
thread.title_full: Serene! - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: HofH999
title: Serene!
text: A true gem. Reputedly the best in town. Delightful rooms, exquisite bathrooms. Truly wonderful, cheerful, welcoming, dedicated staff. So cheerful at the door, in the restaurants. Quite exceptional service. Mio, the Italian restaurant, is a hoot. Most amazing d√©cor, very fine food, charming and engaging staff. Bryan at the Concierge's desk was a stand out for being helpful and thoughtful.
